title: SyncWatch.Video
description: SyncWatch.Video is a webapplication which can be used to watch videos in sync together with others.

title: Pipopipette
description: Pipopipette brings the Dots & Boxes game from paper to the web. Play it online together with a friend, or even with two or three friends a the same time!

title: Krabbl.io
description: On Krabbl.io you can play the drawing game Pictionary online together with others.

title: Management tool csv BOL
description: I developed a tool for soccer club csv BOL that helps the volunteers to create schedules for the referees and changing rooms in a visual and automated way.
